company_name: EXPRO – Zakat Tax And Customs Authority

coverage_details.std: Treatment of STD is covered regardless of mode of infection, including Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid.
coverage_details.checkup: Adult vaccinations, checkup and family doctors according to National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines are covered.
coverage_details.vaccination: Up to SR 9,999,999.99 for children as per MOH schedule (children up to 6 years old), adult vaccinations according to NHS/Weqaya. RSV vaccination covered.
coverage_details.optical_frame: SR 2,000.00, frames covered twice for children up to 14 years, 20% up to 100 SR deductible.
coverage_details.birth_control: Cost of birth control for females covered up to SR 1,500, contraceptive methods covered up to SR 1,500 (not for Parents scheme).
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Any bariatric surgery other than gastric sleeve covered if BMI ≥40, or 35 with complications per guidelines. Coverage: SR 20,000 (overall for obesity surgery).
coverage_details.organ_transplant: SR 50,000 for cost of obtaining/harvesting donor organ. Donor surgery for life organ is covered up to this amount.
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: National program for early detection for newborns up to SR 100,000; early detection of deafness and congenital malformations covered.
coverage_details.psychiatric: SR 50,000 (non-acute psychiatric included), up to 4 visits.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: SR 6,000. Newborn hearing screening also covered up to SR 100,000.
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000, includes crowns/bridges (up to dental limit), pins and post, scaling once per year. Deductible: 20% up to 100 SR for VIP.
coverage_details.dental_corrective: As per general dental limit; crowns, bridges, correction, pins, and post covered.
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature babies care covered up to annual limit. Coverage for newborns under mother's policy up to 30 days from birth.
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: Disability cases including neonatal metabolic screening SR 100,000.
coverage_details.congenital: Acute: covered up to annual limit. Non-acute: covered up to SR 50,000.
coverage_details.maternity: Anti-natal care and normal delivery (NVD) up to SR 15,000; maternity complications, Caesarian, legal abortion up to annual limit. Premature babies care up to annual limit. Epidural injection for delivery covered. Not covered for parents.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000, frames and contact lenses covered up to this limit, 20% up to 100 SR deductible.
coverage_details.screening: Broad newborn and disability newborn screening covered under specific limits (see above).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Standard suite covered up to SAR 4,000. Companion cost covered for all members and parents. Pre-existing and existing chronic conditions are covered. Home Healthcare for needed medical cases is covered (post-surgery wound dressing/IV/urinary catheter). Telemedicine covered. International S.O.S for emergency transport from abroad to KSA. Medical devices (for diabetes, pressure disease, steam) are covered. Nutritional supplements/vitamins/minerals covered if essential and prescribed by authorized physician. All joint replacement surgeries up to SR 50,000. Rehabilitation and artificial limbs up to SR 100,000. Local ambulance, allergy tests, intensive care, psoriasis and infectious diseases requiring hospital isolation are covered.
